name: Send
description: What is the project about? Send App - Cash App for Ethereum. Simple p2p transfers of ethereum, send, and usdt/usdc. Usernames are used instead of addresses. What makes your project unique? Send App will utilize Account Abstraction ERC-4337. This will help with a seamless onboarding for our users. History of your project. Est. 2023. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Development of Send App. Operation Phase: FUSE What can your token be used for? Send Token can be used for paying for transfers within the Send App
